name: Wide Guard
effect: Reaction. Shield Move. Reduce the damage the User and Allies would take from *All Foes* or *Area* moves by 3 for the rest of the round. Reduce minimum damage to 0. Prevent all secondary effects that would trigger on the User and Allies by All Foes or Area moves.
description: The user provides shelter for its allies, spreading itself out to protect from spread attacks.
